thread.title: Movies opening this week: Oct. 18 - Movies
thread.title_full: Movies opening this week: Oct. 18 - Movies - NorthJersey.com

author: The Record
title: Movies opening this week: Oct. 18 - Movies
text:
Buy this photo — From news service reports Top chef: Bradley Cooper tries to pick up the pieces in "Burnt." Burnt 
* Who's who: Bradley Cooper, Sienna Miller, Uma Thurman.
* What's what: A disgraced chef (Cooper) cleans up his act and tries to recapture his former glory.
The Last Witch Hunter 
* Who's who: Vin Diesel, Elijah Wood, Rose Leslie.
* What's what: Diesel stars as mankind's last defense against a tribe of evil witches. No, we're not making this up.
Rock the Kasbah 
* Who's who: Bill Murray, Zooey Deschanel, Kate Hudson.
* What's what: A washed-up rock-and-roll manager (Murray) takes on a new client: a teenage girl competing in the popular TV show "Afghan Star," Afghanistan's version of "American Idol."
Paranormal Activity: The Ghost Dimension 
* Who's who: Chris J. Murray, Brit Shaw, Ivy George.
* What's what: AKA The Horror Film Franchise That Wouldn't Go Away.
Jem and the Holograms 
* Who's who: Aubrey Peeples, Stefanie Scott, Aurora Perrineau, Hayley Kiyoko.
* What's what: A live-action adaptation of the TV cartoon series about the rise of four sisters who form a girl band.
— From news service reports
